Team Profile Generator

Dynamically generated by running index.js at the prompt. Managers are listed at the top, next are Engineers, and lastly the Intern group is generated. Please also note, each ID is unique and error prevention is initialized with this feature. Team count displays the number of member(s) on the team. I utilized Bootstrap as the CSS to keep things simple and have made the page mobile friendly.
